Reviews.Title: NOT WORKING
Reviews.Author: Muhammad Fagieha
Reviews.Content: NOT WORKING1) Charger not working.2) Battery not working.3) The entrance in the mobile phone charger is damaged

Reviews.Title: nokia n96 series
Reviews.Author: Rena bilek Mavrakis "RENA B."
Reviews.Content: I USED THIS PHONE IN THE PASSED AND WAS AMAZED OF THE PICTURES I SHOT WITH THE CAMERA. I LIKE THE NOKIA MENU , WHICH IS  VERY EASY AND HAS EVERYTHING I NEED. THE ONLY HANDICAP IS THE BATTERY ,THAT NEEDS RECHARGING  VERY OFTEN..... SO I SEARCHED AND FOUND IT AGAIN ON AMAZON. I BOUGHT IT AND I AM  VERY SATISFIED WITH IT.....
